div.span: The next Regular School Board Meeting is scheduled for Monday, April 27, 2020 at 7 p.m. Executive order 2020-21 prohibits all public gatherings of any number of people until after April 30, 2020. This requires the Cheboygan Area School Board to meet electronically. Please click on "Board" and "Meetings" below for more information.

header.h2: UPDATE- New time and route for Meals For Students

div.p:
Meals and homework packets for students will be available every Tuesday at the High School from 11:00am-1:00pm. Please form one line by entering the bus lane between the Intermediate School and the High School, drive all the way to the bus garage, turn left, and then left again back into the High School parking lot and drive toward the Drift Inn Restaurant, follow the cones. Packets will be available behind the High School at the South Entrance. Food will be available near the cafeteria entrance. You will exit the High School via Loomis St. Please see the attached pick up route for directions.
Meals will include breakfast and lunch for Wednesday through Monday.
For updates please click "Read More".

h2.a: CAS September Communicator and 2019-20 School Calendar

div.div: The first day of school will be Tuesday, September 3, 2019. We look forward to welcoming everyone back! Click on the link below for the 2019-20 school calendar.

div.style: text-align: center
text-align: center
text-align: center
text-align: center

div.div: Aug 26 Welcome Back! First Day for All Staff
Sept 26 Half Day for Students – PD for Teachers
Nov 1 End of 1st Marking Period (44 Days)
Nov 7 Half Day for Students – Parent/Teacher Conf.
Jan 16-17 Half Day for Students - Exam/Records Day for Teachers

div.strong: End of 2nd Marking Period and 1st Semester (42 Days)

div.div: Feb 17 No School - Mid-Winter Break (All Day PD for Teachers, Potential ½ day if needed to
Mar 5 Half Day for Students – Parent/Teacher Conf.
Mar 6 No School (Potential ½ day if needed to make up Snow Days)
Apr 10 No School - Good Friday (Potential ½ day if needed to make up Snow Days)
Apr 15 Half Day for Students – PD for Teachers
June 9-11 Half Day for Students – Exams/Records Day for Teachers

div.strong: End of 4th Marking Period and 2nd Semester (52 Days)

h3.a: UPDATE- New time and route for Meals For Students

div.div:
Meals and homework packets for students will be available every Tuesday at the High School from 11:00am-1:00pm. Please form one line by entering the bus lane between the Intermediate School and the High School, drive all the way to the bus garage, turn left, and then left again back into the High School parking lot and drive toward the Drift Inn Restaurant, follow the cones. Packets will be available behind the High School at the South Entrance. Food will be available near the cafeteria entrance. You will exit the High School via Loomis St. Please see the attached pick up route for directions. Meals will include breakfast and lunch for Wednesday through Monday.
For updates please click "Read More".

div.a: Find the East Elementary PAC Facebook Group Here »

div.aside: We all recognize a quality education is not merely a destination that a child takes, but a journey. Continuing to challenge ourselves and accept nothing less than “all means all” where every child achieves at a high level will serve as our mission every day.
